channel.title: Chaos Blog - Where I put my thoughts together
channel.description: Recent content on Chaos Blog - Where I put my thoughts together

item.title: About
item.description: About Me 📱 iOS Developer since 2012 🤖, live in Melbourne work at iflix. I feel lucky 🍀 my job is also my hobby 💻. I like to break things fast 💔 and fix things faster 🚀. And most importantly, I’m passionate about creating experiences that users’ love 💕 After work, I also enjoy video games 🎮 and videography 📷.

item.title: Running Oh-My-Zsh inside Spacemacs
item.description: When I start using Spacemacs, I was hoping there is a way to using my own configured zsh inside the Spacemacs workflow, after a look through the documentation, of course we can do it

item.title: Reading Notes for SwiftUI and Combine Programming (1)
item.description: I start reading onevcat new book SwiftUI and Combine Programming (a great book to learning SwiftUI if you can read Chinese). I decided to put all the interest parts and notes in here. First things First We always need to import the dependency first 1 2 import SwiftUI import Combine Layout all the views in the body 1 2 3 var body: some View { /// Layout your view here } some View is a new concept introduced in Swift 5.
